name: mcpollinations_generateImageUrl
description: Generate an image URL from a text prompt. User-configured settings in MCP config will be used as defaults unless specifically overridden.

prompt.description: The text description of the image to generate

model.description: Model name to use for generation (default: user config or "flux"). Use listImageModels to see all available models

enhance.description: Whether to enhance the prompt using an LLM before generating (default: true)

safe.description: Whether to apply content filtering (default: false)

transparent.description: Generate image with transparent background (gptimage model only, default: false)

name: mcpollinations_generateImage
description: Generate an image, return the base64-encoded data, and save to a file by default. User-configured settings in MCP config will be used as defaults unless specifically overridden.

prompt.description: The text description of the image to generate

model.description: Model name to use for generation (default: user config or "flux"). Use listImageModels to see all available models

enhance.description: Whether to enhance the prompt using an LLM before generating (default: true)

safe.description: Whether to apply content filtering (default: false)

transparent.description: Generate image with transparent background (gptimage model only, default: false)

outputPath.description: Directory path where to save the image (default: "./mcpollinations-output")

fileName.description: Name of the file to save (without extension, default: generated from prompt)

format.description: Image format to save as (png, jpeg, jpg, webp - default: png)

name: mcpollinations_editImage
description: Edit or modify an existing image based on a text prompt. User-configured settings in MCP config will be used as defaults unless specifically overridden.

prompt.description: The text description of how to edit the image (e.g., "remove the cat and add a dog", "change background to mountains")

imageUrl.description: URL of the input image to edit

model.description: Model name to use for editing (default: user config or "gptimage"). Available: "gptimage", "kontext"

enhance.description: Whether to enhance the prompt using an LLM before generating (default: true)

safe.description: Whether to apply content filtering (default: false)

transparent.description: Generate image with transparent background (gptimage model only, default: false)

outputPath.description: Directory path where to save the image (default: user config or "./mcpollinations-output")

fileName.description: Name of the file to save (without extension, default: generated from prompt)

format.description: Image format to save as (png, jpeg, jpg, webp - default: png)

name: mcpollinations_generateImageFromReference
description: Generate a new image using an existing image as reference. User-configured settings in MCP config will be used as defaults unless specifically overridden.

prompt.description: The text description of what to generate based on the reference image (e.g., "create a cartoon version", "make it look like a painting")

imageUrl.description: URL of the reference image to base the generation on

model.description: Model name to use for generation (default: user config or "gptimage"). Available: "gptimage", "kontext"

enhance.description: Whether to enhance the prompt using an LLM before generating (default: true)

safe.description: Whether to apply content filtering (default: false)

transparent.description: Generate image with transparent background (gptimage model only, default: false)

outputPath.description: Directory path where to save the image (default: user config or "./mcpollinations-output")

fileName.description: Name of the file to save (without extension, default: generated from prompt)

format.description: Image format to save as (png, jpeg, jpg, webp - default: png)

name: mcpollinations_respondAudio
description: Generate an audio response to a text prompt and play it through the system

prompt.description: The text prompt to respond to with audio

voice.description: Voice to use for audio generation (default: "alloy"). Available options: "alloy", "echo", "fable", "onyx", "nova", "shimmer", "coral", "verse", "ballad", "ash", "sage", "amuch", "dan"

name: mcpollinations_listAudioVoices
description: List all available audio voices for text-to-speech generation

name: mcpollinations_respondText
description: Respond with text to a prompt using the Pollinations Text API. User-configured settings in MCP config will be used as defaults unless specifically overridden.

prompt.description: The text prompt to generate a response for

model.description: Model to use for text generation (default: user config or "openai"). Use listTextModels to see all available models

temperature.description: Controls randomness in the output (0.0 to 2.0, default: user config or model default)

top_p.description: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling (0.0 to 1.0, default: user config or model default)

system.description: System prompt to guide the model's behavior (default: user config or none)
